hero.title: Explore the Universe, Discover New Worlds
hero.description: Experience zero gravity, orbit breathtaking planets, and witness the beauty of the cosmos up close.

weatherForecast.title: Space Weather Forecast
weatherForecast.description: Stay safe with real-time cosmic weather reports, from solar storms to asteroid activity.

orbitalHotels.title: Orbital Hotels
orbitalHotels.description: Stay in luxury orbital hotels with breathtaking views of Earth and the stars. Zero-gravity dining, sky lounges, and more.

planetaryExploration.title: Planetary Exploration
planetaryExploration.description: Step on new worlds, explore exotic terrains, and collect cosmic souvenirs.

cosmicEntertainment.title: Cosmic Entertainment
cosmicEntertainment.description: From zero-gravity concerts to holographic theaters, experience entertainment like never before in space.

moonBase.name: Moon Base Alpha
moonBase.description: Walk on the Moon, drive lunar rovers, and stay in the first luxury Moon base.

marsColony.name: Mars Colony Visit
marsColony.description: Explore Mars habitats, witness the sunset over Olympus Mons, and join the Red Planet adventure.

spaceStation.name: Space Station Cruise
spaceStation.description: Enjoy orbital hotels, zero-gravity dining, and panoramic views of Earth from space.

booking.title: Book your next trip in 3 easy steps

orbitalHotelStay.title: Orbital Hotel Stay
orbitalHotelStay.description: Enjoy 3 nights in a luxury orbital hotel with panoramic Earth views.

moonWalkExperience.title: Moon Walk Experience
moonWalkExperience.description: Step onto the Moon's surface and drive lunar rovers in guided missions.

nebulaSightseeingCruise.title: Nebula Sightseeing Cruise
nebulaSightseeingCruise.description: Embark on a week-long interstellar cruise ship journey through colorful nebulae. Enjoy panoramic observation decks, zero-gravity lounges, and cosmic photography tours.

ai.description: Enter a planet, AI will suggest places to visit
